items.description:
Hey Everyone,

There is a new MAUI Preview out with some nice new bits. Check out the blog posts and video by Gerald.

In good news, Melbourne is heading out of full scale lockdown this week, so maybe life will start getting back to normal soon... maybe.

Hope you have a great week.

Kym
items.description_markdown:
Hey Everyone,

There is a new MAUI Preview out with some nice new bits. Check out the blog posts and video by Gerald.

In good news, Melbourne is heading out of full scale lockdown this week, so maybe life will start getting back to normal soon... maybe.

Hope you have a great week.

Kym

items.title: Alternating CollectionView Row Colors
items.description:
Alternating row colours in a CollectionView is quite often a design requirement. In this blog post, Toby shows you a simple, reusable converter to solve this.

Xamarin.Forms CollectionView Alternating Row Colors by Toby Field

Alternating row colours in a CollectionView is quite often a design requirement. In this blog post, Toby shows you a simple, reusable converter to solve this.

items.title: Masks with Plugin.ValidationRules
items.description:
Learn how to apply masks to your validation rules on users' text entries in Xamarin.Forms. The best, and fastest, the way is to use the Plugin.ValidationRules library.

Masks with Plugin.ValidationRules in Xamarin.Forms by Luis Matos
items.description_markdown:
Learn how to apply masks to your validation rules on users' text entries in Xamarin.Forms. The best, and fastest, the way is to use the Plugin.ValidationRules library.

[**Masks with Plugin.ValidationRules in Xamarin.Forms**](https://luismts.com/masks-plugin-validationrules-xamarin-forms/) by [Luis Matos](https://twitter.com/luismatosluna)

items.title: Build MAUI Apps in an Azure VM
items.description:
If you want to play with MAUI but don't want to install it on your main machine, or perhaps you just want to have an isolated environment, then check out this blog post on how to setup a MAUI development environment in the cloud.

Build MAUI Apps in an Azure VM — App vNext by Carl Franklin
items.description_markdown:
If you want to play with MAUI but don't want to install it on your main machine, or perhaps you just want to have an isolated environment, then check out this blog post on how to setup a MAUI development environment in the cloud.

items.title: All Things Tabs!
items.description:
Today, we look at Tabs! Both the TabbedPage and using Tabs with Shell in both Xamarin.Forms and .NET MAUI. We explore top tabs, bottom tabs, tab sandwiches, navigation, customization, colors, and so much more! It is 30 minutes on TABS!

All Things Tabs! Top Tabs, Bottom Tabs, Tab Sandwich - Xamarin.Forms & .NET MAUI by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
Today, we look at Tabs! Both the TabbedPage and using Tabs with Shell in both Xamarin.Forms and .NET MAUI. We explore top tabs, bottom tabs, tab sandwiches, navigation, customization, colors, and so much more! It is 30 minutes on TABS!

[**All Things Tabs! Top Tabs, Bottom Tabs, Tab Sandwich - Xamarin.Forms & .NET MAUI**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YDxQjb7N-P8) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/JamesMontemagno)

items.title: The .NET MAUI Podcast Episode 100: Preview-Mania
items.description:
All the previews and release candidates you could ever want. .NET 6 RC 2 - the final RC. .NET MAUI Preview 9, Visual Studio RC and Preview 5 - there's even a Visual Studio for Mac preview to talk about!

Tune in as David and Matt talk all about the previews!

The .NET MAUI Podcast Episode 100: Preview-Mania by .NET MAUI Podcast
items.description_markdown:
All the previews and release candidates you could ever want. .NET 6 RC 2 - the final RC. .NET MAUI Preview 9, Visual Studio RC and Preview 5 - there's even a Visual Studio for Mac preview to talk about!

Tune in as David and Matt talk all about the previews!

[**The .NET MAUI Podcast Episode 100: Preview-Mania**](https://www.dotnetmauipodcast.com/100) by [.NET MAUI Podcast](https://www.dotnetmauipodcast.com)

items.title: Xamarin Alerts, Dialogs and More on Steroids with Acr.UserDialogs
items.description:
The default alerts and dialogs in Xamarin.Forms are nice, but leave room for improvement. Enter Acr.UserDialogs. This plugin has been around for years and offers: loading and progress indicators, alerts, prompts and much more! It's also perfect to use with dependency injection! Come check it out!

Xamarin Alerts, Dialogs and More on Steroids with Acr.UserDialogs by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
The default alerts and dialogs in Xamarin.Forms are nice, but leave room for improvement. Enter Acr.UserDialogs. This plugin has been around for years and offers: loading and progress indicators, alerts, prompts and much more! It's also perfect to use with dependency injection! Come check it out!

[**Xamarin Alerts, Dialogs and More on Steroids with Acr.UserDialogs**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tu8MtPiAsX8) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **Xamarin Alerts, Dialogs and More on Steroids with Acr.UserDialogs**

items.title: Merge Conflict: 276: .NET 6 + C# 10 == Mind Blown
items.description:

items.title: Gerald walks through the .NET MAUI Preview 9 Update
items.description:
The new preview of .NET MAUI has been released, preview 9. In this preview more controls that have been ported from Xamarin.Forms, but more importantly a new addition: borders, corners and shadows on all controls! This is nuts! Go check it out!

.NET MAUI Preview 9: Borders, Corners and Shadows on Everything! by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
The new preview of .NET MAUI has been released, preview 9. In this preview more controls that have been ported from Xamarin.Forms, but more importantly a new addition: borders, corners and shadows on all controls! This is nuts! Go check it out!

[**.NET MAUI Preview 9: Borders, Corners and Shadows on Everything!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SPHn6DhBSYQ) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **.NET MAUI Preview 9: Borders, Corners and Shadows on Everything!**

items.title: The All-New .NET MAUI Tab View Control Is Here
items.description:
The .NET Multi-platform App UI (MAUI) is an evolution of Xamarin.Forms. It mainly focuses on single project development for different platforms such as Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows. Syncfusion has shipped a set of cool .NET MAUI tools that includes Charts, Radial Gauge, and Tab View controls.

The All-New .NET MAUI Tab View Control Is Here | Syncfusion Blogs by Selva Ganapathy Kathiresan
items.description_markdown:
The .NET Multi-platform App UI (MAUI) is an evolution of Xamarin.Forms. It mainly focuses on single project development for different platforms such as Android, iOS, macOS, and Windows. Syncfusion has shipped a set of cool .NET MAUI tools that includes Charts, Radial Gauge, and Tab View controls.

[**The All-New .NET MAUI Tab View Control Is Here | Syncfusion Blogs**](https://www.syncfusion.com/blogs/post/the-all-new-net-maui-tab-view-control-is-here.aspx) by [Selva Ganapathy Kathiresan](https://www.syncfusion.com/blogs/author/selva-ganapathy-k)

embedded_links.title: **The All-New .NET MAUI Tab View Control Is Here | Syncfusion Blogs**
